attributes.action: SUPPORT DEFEAT TERRORISTS / SUICIDE BOMBERS / LTTE IN SRI LANKA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current democratically elected government is trying to end terrorism. Please support the Buddhist elected government to end terrorism by defeating illegal, the world’s most brutal killing machine that is born to KILL with NO RESPECT FOR HUMANITY.  

Please be assured any support for terrorists will see more violence on British soil as you may have already witnessed.  Please support end suicide bombers. Please support Sri Lanka government and press for unconditional surrender of terrorists/suicide bombers and release tamil civilians. 

STOP FUNDRAISING BY LTTE SUICIDES IN UK. 

SUPPORT SRI LANKA GOVERNMENT TO ERADICATE LTTE SUICIDES.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
